JUNOS image names to device mapping

Dec 5, 2019

Which JUNOS image on which device and RE? This question always comes into the mind whenever I have to update the box.

Here is the Mapping from the Rahul Unnikrishnan script Script link:

junos_image_name_format_map:

junos_image_name_format_1:

RE-DUO-2600: jinstall64-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz
RE-MX80: jinstall-ppc-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz
RE-S-1800x4: jinstall64-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz
RE-S-2000: jinstall-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz

junos_image_name_format_2:

RE-DUO-2600: jinstall64-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz
RE-MX80: jinstall-ppc-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz
RE-PTX-2X00x4: junos-vmhost-install-ptx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-PTX-2X00x6: junos-vmhost-install-ptx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-PTX-2X00x8: junos-vmhost-install-ptx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-1800x4: junos-install-mx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-2000: junos-install-mx-x86-32-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-2X00x6: junos-vmhost-install-mx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-2X00x8: junos-vmhost-install-mx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz

junos_image_name_format_3:

RE-DUO-2600: jinstall64-VERSION_NUMBER-domestic-signed.tgz
RE-MX80: jinstall-ppc-VERSION_NUMBER-signed.tgz
RE-PTX-2X00x4: junos-vmhost-install-ptx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-PTX-2X00x6: junos-vmhost-install-ptx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-PTX-2X00x8: junos-vmhost-install-ptx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-1800x4: junos-install-mx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-2000: junos-install-mx-x86-32-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-2X00x6: junos-vmhost-install-mx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
RE-S-2X00x8: junos-vmhost-install-mx-x86-64-VERSION_NUMBER.tgz
